summary.span: 从任意源接收多播流量的客户端接收器，亦称为任意源多播 (ASM) 或 Internet 标准多播 (ISM)。

span.span: A client receiver for multicast traffic from any source, also known as Any Source Multicast (ASM) or Internet Standard Multicast (ISM).

param.name: groupAddress
param.span: 此接收器要订阅的多播组地址。

span.span: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.

param.name: localPort
param.span: 此接收器要绑定到的本地端口。

span.span: The local port for this receiver to bind to.

summary.span: 创建一个可以订阅组地址并从任意源接收数据报的新 UDP 客户端。

span.span: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from any source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将 UDP 多播套接字与组地址和端口关联，但不绑定或以其他方式使用套接字。The constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket. 参数可以是 `groupAddress` IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. `localPort`参数不得指定小于1024的端口。The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.

span.span: is .
reference
is less than 0 -or- is greater than 65,535.

param.name: callback
param.span: 要在此操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: A callback method to invoke when the operation completes.

param.name: state
param.span: 要为此操作传递给 方法的可选状态信息。

span.span: Optional state information to pass to the method for this operation.

summary.span: 绑定套接字并开始执行多播组的联接操作，以便允许接收来自任何组参与者的数据报。

span.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any group participant.
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 UDP 多播套接字绑定到本地端口，并联接多播组，以允许从任何多播组参与者接收数据报。The method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any multicast group participant. 本地端口和多播组地址是在构造函数中指定的 。The local port and multicast group address are specified in the constructor. `callback`当联接多播组的操作已完成时，将调用参数中指定的方法。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed. 如果运行时需要，该 方法还执行策略检查以验证是否允许客户端访问多路广播组。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果不允许客户端访问， 则会引发 。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with .

exception.span: 已经联接多播组，或联接操作正在进行。

span.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

summary.span: 开始执行从已联接的多播组接收数据包的操作，并在来自任何发送方的数据包到达组时调用指定的回调。

span.span: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from any sender.
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始从任何发送方的已联接的多播组接收 UDP 数据包的操作。The method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from any sender. 本地端口和多播组地址是在构造函数中指定的 。The local port and multicast group address are specified in the constructor. 多播客户端还必须已完成到多播组的联接。The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group. 接收到数据包时，将调用参数中指定的方法 `callback` 。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 如果接收操作同步失败，则可能会出现套接字故障，但这种情况不太常见。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果出现套接字故障， 则会引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误被指定为枚举的成员 。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 开始执行向指定目标发送单播数据包的操作。

span.span: Begins the operation of sending a unicast packet to the specified destination.
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始将 UDP 数据包发送到已联接的多播组的操作。The method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the joined multicast group. 客户端必须已完成到多播组的联接。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. 参数中指定的目标地址 `remoteEndPoint` 必须已向此接收方发送了多播数据包。The destination address specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter must have already sent a multicast packet to this receiver. 某些协议使用此信息传递流控制、服务统计信息或恢复消息。Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages. 接收到数据包时，将调用参数中指定的方法 `callback` 。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 仅当参数中指定的地址已 `remoteEndPoint` 向此接收方发送了多播数据包时，才允许传输。The transmission is only allowed if the address specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter has already sent a multicast packet to this receiver. 如果不允许客户端访问， 则会引发 。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with . 如果参数中指定的目标端口 `remoteEndPoint` 小于1024， 则会引发 。If the destination port specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter is less than 1,024, a is thrown with . 如果接收操作同步失败，则可能会出现套接字故障，但这种情况不太常见。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果出现套接字故障， 则会引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误被指定为枚举的成员 。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

param.name: sourceAddress
param.span: 要阻止的源地址。

span.span: The address of the source to block.

summary.span: 阻止源，从而不再接收源自它的多播数据包。

span.span: Blocks a source so that multicast packets originating from it are no longer received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法阻止接收来自指定源地址的多播数据包。The method blocks multicast packets originating from a specified source address from being received. 客户端必须已完成到多播组的联接。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. 参数可以是 `sourceAddress` IPv6 地址或 IPv4 地址，但 `sourceAddress` 参数必须与客户端加入的多路广播组的地址族匹配。The `sourceAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 address, but the `sourceAddress` parameter must match the address family of the multicast group that the client joined. 接收到数据包时，将调用参数中指定的方法 `callback` 。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 如果在执行块源操作时出现套接字错误， 则会引发。If there is a socket failure while performing the block source operation, a is thrown. 收到的错误被指定为枚举的成员 。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

summary.span: 离开多播组并释放 类和基础 的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . Dispose 方法会使 处于不可用状态。The Dispose method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成到套接字的异步绑定，并将操作联接到多播组。The method completes an asynchronous bind to a socket and join operation to a multicast group. 如果运行时需要，该 方法还执行策略检查以验证是否允许客户端访问多路广播组。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果不允许客户端访问， 则会引发 。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with . 如果在执行联接组操作时出现套接字错误， 则会引发。If there is a socket failure while performing the join group operation, a is thrown. 收到的错误被指定为枚举的成员 。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定传出的多路广播数据包是否传递到发送应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.
Returns .

value.span: 一个值，该值指示向多路广播组发送的传出数据包是否传递到发送应用程序。

span.span: A value that indicates if outgoing packets to a multicast group are delivered to the sending application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多播流量是 Internet 上多对多通信的可扩展方法。Multicast traffic is a scalable method for many-to-many communication on the Internet. 进程订阅多路广播组地址。A process subscribes to a multicast group address. 然后，由订阅的进程发送到多播组的任何数据包都由每个订阅了多播地址的其他进程接收。Then, any packets sent by a subscribed process to the multicast group are received by every other process subscribed to the multicast address. 属性控制本地计算机上的任何进程是否接收此客户端发送到多播组的多播数据包。The property controls whether any process on the local computer receives multicast packets sent by this client to the multicast group.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 实例上的多播接收操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置 用于此实例上的多播接收操作的基础的接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位） 。The property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying used for multicast receive operations on this instance. 具体而言， 属性控制堆栈在包到达时使用的缓冲区大小，但应用程序尚未调用 方法。Specifically, the property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the method. 如果此缓冲区已满，并且包在应用程序调用和方法之前继续存在 ，则将删除旧的数据包。If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the and methods, old packets will get dropped. 应用程序将永远无法接收旧数据包，并将在调用方法时接收到较新的数据包 。The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the method. Windows 上的接收缓冲区的默认大小为8192个字节。The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192 bytes.

exception.span: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 实例上的多播发送操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the used for multicast send operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置用于此实例上的多播发送操作的基础套接字的发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位） 。The property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying Socket used for multicast send operations on this instance. 如果发送缓冲区已满，则对或方法的调用将需要更长的时间来调用回调，具体取决于属性的值。calls to the or methods will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the property if the send buffer is full. 属性仅控制用户的缓冲区是否在物理内存中保持锁定状态，直到发送完成。The property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes. Windows 上的发送缓冲区的默认大小为8192个字节。The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192 bytes.

exception.span: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

param.name: sourceAddress
param.span: 要取消阻止的源的地址。

span.span: The address of the source to unblock.

summary.span: 取消阻止以前通过调用 方法阻止的源，以便接收来自该源的多播数据包。

span.span: Unblocks a source that was previously blocked by a call to the method so that multicast packets originating from it can be received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取消阻止源自指定源地址的多播数据包，以便可以接收这些数据包。The method unblocks multicast packets originating from a specified source address so they can be received. 指定的源地址之前必须已被调用 方法阻止。The specified source address must have previously been blocked by a call to the method. 客户端必须已完成到多播组的联接。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. 参数可以是 `sourceAddress` IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。The `sourceAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. 如果在参数中指定的源地址 `sourceAddress` 以前未被调用 方法阻止， 则会引发 。If the specified source address in the `sourceAddress` parameter was not previously blocked by a call to the method, a is thrown with . 如果执行取消阻止源操作时出现套接字错误， 则会引发。If there is a socket failure while performing the unblock source operation, a is thrown. 收到的错误被指定为枚举的成员 。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
